Html:
Hi,

I am using PHPExcel library to generate excel sheets with 3d stacked bar charts.

By default the "perspective" rotation value is 15 degree. i need to change it to 0 degree to display flat chart.

And one more thing...

there are several designs for charts in Excel file, how can i change the chart design using PHPExcel library.

Thanks in Advance,

Sandeep

The chart extensions for PHPExcel are still experimental, still limited at the moment, and still undocumented. They will be developed further in the future, and that will include such features as rotation settings for 3d styles (as well as formal documentation).
Thanks for your reply mark.. Hope we will access all those features very soon
